message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Let's split it 90/10, I'll take the bigger share.
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to give away all the money.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split it 60/40 this time.  We can avoid going another round and both get a decent share.
I'm not budging, you'll have to make a better offer if you want to get a bigger share.
Bob, we're both losing money with every round. Let's split it 50/50 and call it a day.
